conv_baaf40ea.content: Hello, I'm an AI assistant for SecureLife Insurance Company. How can I help?
Can you tell me what kind of service availble there?
We offer life insurance, health insurance, and general insurance.
I'm glad to help. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
What are the prerequisites for insuraces you are providing?

The prerequisites for our insurance policies include submitting claim forms, the original policy document, a NEFT mandate for direct credit of the claim amount to the bank account, proof of title, proof of death, and medical treatment prior to death (if applicable). If the age is not admitted under the policy, proof of age of the Life Assured must also be submitted.
